pages.text: One way to get a STAND comes from the ability of father pucci, the BOSS in the sixth installment of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure,white snake.$(li)Right - click to get the STAND information in the disc.

pages.title: Tarot
pages.text: A means by which players can store avatars on their own, based on the tarot CARDS used for the divination of Avdol in the third episode of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure$(li)Right - click to get the STAND, stealth - right - click to remove STAND.$(li)It is currently only available from the chests of Ender City and the Desert Temple.

pages.title: Singularity
pages.text: The object of an evolutionary STAND, the point at which the universe condensed after it ended in acceleration, comes from the Father Pucci's principle of the circle.$(li)Right - click to enter the final trial, reaching the new world after the avatar completes evolution.
